name: mailgun-js
description: Simple Node.js helper module for Mailgun API

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:clean && gitbook build
scripts.docs:watch: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:prepare && gitbook serve
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push https://github.com/bojand/mailgun-js.git gh-pages --force
